official.headline: Council Integrity Affirmed
official.anchor_line: Recent findings confirm internal procedural evaluations maintain the integrity of Stenograd's governance systems.
official.contextual_reframing: This transparency demonstrates our commitment to excellence and the ongoing refinement of truly capable leadership.

underground.headline: Council Chaos Uncovered
underground.anchor_line: Council members implicated in a corruption scandal that rocks Stenograd's trusted systems.
underground.contextual_reframing: Leaked documents reveal deep-seated sabotage, exposing the Council's true priorities over public good.
